import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from "reactstrap" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import '.new-card.css'; const newCard = ({newarrival}) => { const {id, title, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews } = newarrival return (
New
{avgRating}{" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /one item
) } export default newCard
